title: Soul Collector

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Watch a player each night and attempt to collect their soul.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the player you watch dies at night, you will collect their soul.
- You will passively gain one soul from the Underworld.
- Your visits are Astral.
- When you have collected 6 souls, you will transform into (3879b) Death.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Successfully collect 6 souls and become Death.

desc:
Post 3879
*I don't care about this role, so you get a whale. üê≥*
